email_chain.subject: Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Yokohama
email_chain.body:
Dear Emily,

I hope this message finds you well. I am reaching out from Sea Brokers to offer a shipment of coal from Newcastle to Yokohama.

We have the vessel OCEAN BREEZE available for this route, with a cargo size of 50,000 MT. The freight quote is USD 25/MT under CIF terms.

Please let me know if you have any questions or need further details.

Best regards,
Lucas Martinez
Sea Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Yokohama
email_chain.body:
Hi Lucas,

Thank you for the offer. The rate seems a bit high compared to current market rates. Could you provide more details on the vessel's DWT and LOA? Also, what is the laycan for this shipment?

Best,
Emily Carter

email_chain.subject: Re: Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Yokohama
email_chain.body:
Hi Emily,

The OCEAN BREEZE has a DWT of 75,000 and LOA of 225m. The laycan is flexible, but we are targeting a loading window starting around 2023-03-25.

Regarding the rate, we believe it is competitive given the current market conditions. However, we are open to discussions.

Best regards,
Lucas

email_chain.subject: Re: Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Yokohama
email_chain.body:
Lucas,

Thank you for the additional details. We are considering combining cargo from a nearby port to optimize the vessel’s round trip. Could you provide a quote for a multi-port option?

Also, what is the demurrage rate per day?

Best,
Emily

email_chain.subject: Re: Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Yokohama
email_chain.body:
Hi Emily,

For a multi-port option, we would need to look at the specifics, but we can certainly discuss it. The demurrage rate is USD 12,000 per day.

Let me know if you have more details on the additional port and cargo size.

Best regards,
Lucas

email_chain.subject: Re: Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Yokohama
email_chain.body:
Lucas,

We are looking at an additional 10,000 MT from a port nearby Newcastle. Could you revise the freight quote considering this additional cargo?

Best,
Emily

email_chain.subject: Re: Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Yokohama
email_chain.body:
Hi Emily,

Considering the additional cargo, we can offer a revised freight quote of USD 23/MT. This rate takes into account the economies of scale with the increased cargo size.

Best regards,
Lucas

email_chain.subject: Re: Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Yokohama
email_chain.body:
Lucas,

The revised rate looks good. We are ready to proceed with the shipment. Please confirm the laycan and stem details.

Best,
Emily

email_chain.subject: Re: Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Yokohama
email_chain.body:
Hi Emily,

Great to hear that! We will confirm the laycan as 2023-03-25 to 2023-03-30. We will also ensure that the stem is ready by then.

Looking forward to a successful shipment.

Best regards,
Lucas
